T02D1461:11a-0: @11a * // sapta aa ksha ra s'a dha nam /
T02D1461:11a-2: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1461:11a-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1461:11a-4: byis pa bung med phal cher ni //
T02D1461:11a-5: rgyas par gzung dkar 'gyur bas na //
T02D1461:11a-6: mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas //
T02D1461:11a-7: yi ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya ;
T02D1461:11a-8: / mchod sogs stong nyid byang chub kyi //
T02D1461:11a-9: sngags kyi mthar thug 'og tu ni //
T02D1461:11a-10: brtser lhan lus kyi dbus son pa'i //
T02D1461:11a-11: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya //
T02D1461:11a-12: yam ram bam lam 'byung pa bzhi'i //
T02D1461:11a-13: dkyil 'khor steng du sum las byung //
T02D1461:11a-14: lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang //
T02D1461:11a-15: rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya ;
T02D1461:11a-16: / aom me di n'i badzr'i bha pa badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1461:11a-17: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1461:11a-18: aom badzra panydza ra h'um ram h'um /
T02D1461:11a-19: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1461:11a-20: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tr'am sam tr'am /
T02D1461:11a-21: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1461:11a-22: rdo rje sa sogs drug byas nas //
T02D1461:11a-23: 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas //
T02D1461:11a-24: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ;
T02D1461:11a-25: / rtsibs drug la ni bri bar bya //
T02D1461:11a-26: 'dir ni h'um las byung pha yi //
T02D1461:11a-27: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen po //
T02D1461:11a-28: phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa //
T02D1461:11a-29: mtshan kun gyis mtshan bsgom par bya //
T02D1461:11a-30: dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag ldan //
T02D1461:11a-31: khyab bdag a'a li k'a lis byung //
T02D1461:11a-32: rdo rje dril bus snyoms bar zhugs //
T02D1461:11a-33: mi yi pags pa rlon pa 'chang //
T02D1461:11a-34: g-yon pa thong pa kha t'am ga / phyag g-yas na ni mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1461:11a-35: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang //
T02D1461:11a-36: ral pas sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1461:11a-37: zla ba phyed pa'i thod dang ni //
T02D1461:11a-38: phyag rgya drug gis sku la bklubs //
T02D1461:11a-39: mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal ;
T02D1461:11a-40: / stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1461:11a-41: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mo //
T02D1461:11a-42: g-yas brkyang ba yis nyi mar mnan //
T02D1461:11a-43: mgon po ji lta de bzhin du //
T02D1461:11a-44: rdo rje phag mo'ang phyag la sogs //
T02D1461:11a-45: lha mo byin pa yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1461:11a-46: mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo //
T02D1461:11a-47: dza: h'um bam ho: yi ge 'dis ;
T02D1461:11a-48: / ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa //
T02D1461:11a-49: rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la //
T02D1461:11a-50: g-yon du bskor bas rnam bskor bas //
T02D1461:11a-51: dad po lha mo khrag 'thung ma //
T02D1461:11a-52: gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma //
T02D1461:11a-53: gsum pa drug gtum ma dang ni //
T02D1461:11a-54: bzhi pa rdo rje snang byed ma //
T02D1461:11a-55: lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste //
T02D1461:11b-0: @11b drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin //
T02D1461:11b-1: sngon mo ser mo ljang gu dang //
T02D1461:11b-2: dmar mo dud ka de bzhin dkar //
T02D1461:11b-3: skra bshig ma la drag chen ma //
T02D1461:11b-4: spyan gsum ma sta phyogs kyi gos //
T02D1461:11b-5: phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni //
T02D1461:11b-6: sgra sgrogs da ma ru dril bus mtshan //
T02D1461:11b-7: mi yi pags pa bsnams pa ste ;
T02D1461:11b-8: / yi dags nyi ma'i steng na gnas //
T02D1461:11b-9: thong pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
T02D1461:11b-10: g-yas brkyang gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1461:11b-11: lha rnams thams cad go rims bzhin //
T02D1461:11b-12: yi ge drug las byung ba bsgom //
T02D1461:11b-13: l'am m'am p'am t'am kham zhes pas //
T02D1461:11b-14: khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab //
T02D1461:11b-15: aom a'am hri ho h'um hr'i zhes //
T02D1461:11b-16: gzugs sogs phung po la yang ngo /
T02D1461:11b-17: bhr'um h'um kha a'a ho ham gis //
T02D1461:11b-18: skye mched rnams ni sbyang bar bya //
T02D1461:11b-24: brang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang //
T02D1461:11b-25: mig la sogs par spyar bar bya //
T02D1461:11b-26: aom bam ham yom hrim mom hre hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1461:11b-27: lte ba snyid ga kha dang ni //
T02D1461:11b-28: spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgod //
T02D1461:11b-29: lus dang ngag lam sems la ni //
T02D1461:11b-30: aom a'a: h'um ni dgod par bya //
T02D1461:11b-32: lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'i //
T02D1461:11b-33: bdud rtsi lnga yi khu bas gang //
T02D1461:11b-34: thod pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
T02D1461:11b-35: mchod dang bstod dad bdud rtsi myang ;
T02D1461:11b-36: / byas par gyur pas spyad par bya //
T02D1461:11b-37: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1461:11b-38: gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa bzlas //
T02D1461:11b-39: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat //
T02D1461:11b-40: bsam gtan bzlas pa gang tshe skyo //
T02D1461:11b-41: de tshe dag pa rjes dran bya //
T02D1461:11b-42: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1461:11b-43: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o //
T02D1461:11b-44: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02D1461:11b-45: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rab gtum ma'o //
T02D1461:11b-46: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o //
T02D1461:11b-47: ting de 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o //
T02D1461:11b-48: mgur chu gdu bu rin chen dang //
T02D1461:11b-49: rna cha gdub kor tshangs skung de //
T02D1461:11b-50: de dag pha rol phyin pa drug / phyag rgya'i gzugs su sbyar ba yin //
